markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[True Name](/Traits.aspx?ID=393)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 245 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

Certain spells, feats, and items have the true name trait. This trait means they require you to [know a creature's true name](/Rules.aspx?ID=1569) to use them.
name: True Name
